LanguageData.NLNT.DaysUntilRecoveryLabel: Days until full use of limbs, based on tech-level of limb
LanguageData.NLNT.DaysUntilRecoveryToolTip: Efficency of a limb will start at 0 and increase to the default value during this amount of days.
